alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 11:54AM MDT until March 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. For the Highway 12 corridor: 2 to 5 inches. Snow will mix with rain this evening for lower elevations, then transition over to all snow tonight into Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
